name: The Dark Side of Luna
description:
Welcome to the dark side of Luna! You are a girl searching for her missing father. Collect light energies, evade the enemies and change your state to see invisible paths. 

Controls: 

ActionKeyboardJoystickMovementA, S/Left and Right Arrows
D-Pad or AnalogicJumpW/Up Arrow
X (PS) - A (Xbox)AttackSpacebarL1Change stateFR1InteractETriangle - Y (Xbox)
